text: I just finished the HubSpot CMS for Developers exam. Nothing happens when I try to click the “Email me my exam breakdown” link, does it suppose to do something?

Hi <@U02RWUFM1KQ>. We've seen this before. Unfortunately the UX on that feature isn't awesome. There's no clear confirmation the request was sent. That being said, it should work despite the lack of feedback. Did you get the email?

Hi <@U3PKJ8EQL>, thanks for the quick response. I didn't get any emails actually, even though I have tried to click the link a number of times, as well as refresh the page then click again. Sad to know it represents an important functionality which doesn't work all the time :neutral_face:

Hmmm. That's odd. I messaged the team who handles this functionality to see if there are any known bugs beyond the button not responding in the UI. Are you sure you're checking the email you're using to access the course (and any spam folders)?

Oh, yeah. Just checked other folders, and found a couple of emails in there. Thanks for clarification, the basic functionality works except the UI (no visual info about the status of email delivery). Thanks again for the help!
Oh good! Thanks for the followup. Sorry about the confusion.

<@U3PKJ8EQL> <@U02RWUFM1KQ> I have a prospect that is looking for a web form that stores the lead data from the form straight to the hs crm. Is there a course that a covers that functionality? I've look and don't see one.

Sounds like they’re looking to learn about HubSpot Forms
<https://www.HubSpot.com/products/marketing/forms>



There’s a lesson here on creating the forms:
<https://academy.HubSpot.com/lessons/creating-forms-in-HubSpot?library=true&library=true&q=forms>

Here’s a related lesson more specifically about capturing leads
<https://academy.HubSpot.com/lessons/capture-leads-in-HubSpot?library=true&q=forms&library=true>

In general though. I’d say if they want to learn the whole philosophy around how to use forms for lead gen, and how best to nurture the leads etc. They should take the Inbound marketing certification course. (regardless of if they want the certification
<https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/inbound-marketing?library=true&q=inbound%20marketing&library=true>
Fantastic! Thank you <@U7SL518D6> for the info.
